email_body: $100 for the yard seems like enough for up to 12.5 hours. How long did it take him? I think $100 should be enough. Use Page Setup under the File menu to change from Portrait to Landscape if you want to change from printing vertically to printing horizontally. Also try selecting Fit to one page if you want your print out to be on only one page. Use Print preview to see what your print out will look like before you print. The truck might need new sparkplugs at around 120,000-125,000 miles. A valve adjustment might do some good. It has idled very high for the last 25,000 miles, but it has never broken down. Glad to hear about the good deposit for this week. Great job on February. Phillip
